General.Name: LCL Resources
General.Description: LCL Resources Limited operates as a mineral exploration and mining company in Colombia and Papua New Guinea. The company explores for gold, copper, and nickel. It focuses on the Quinchia gold project covering an area of 10,500 hectares located in central west Colombia. The company also holds 90% interest in the Andes gold project covering an area of 85,000 hectares located in the state of Antioquia. The company was formerly known as Los Cerros Limited and changed its name to LCL Resources Limited in June 2023. LCL Resources Limited was incorporated in 2006 and is based in West Perth, Australia.
